detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.
Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.

Set with a vest top and shorts in soft viscose jersey. Top with a hole-embroidered section at the back of the neck. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Fine-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.

Set with all-in-on pyjamas, bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Pyjamas with feet and press-studs down the front and one leg. Bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist. Hat with ribbing.

Bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a print motif on the front, press-stud on the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in ribbed jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Dungarees in soft, organic cotton twill with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and heart-shaped patch front pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and legs, and ribbed hems.

Set with a top and trousers in soft cotton. Top with print stripes, buttons on the shoulders, ribbing at the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist, fake front pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hem.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey bodysuit and dress in organic cotton. Patterned bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on both shoulders. Dress in soft chambray with frills, shoulder straps that cross and fasten at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated, ribbed waist, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated, ribbed waist, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Narrow belts, one braided and one smooth, in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.

Parka in a patterned cotton weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, flap side pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Jacket in washed cotton twill with embroidery, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, welt side pockets and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and embroidery at the top and back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Shorts in washed stretch denim with detachable elasticated straps with imitation leather details and concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets, back pockets, button at the waist and slim legs with worn details.
Hat in felted wool with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, superstretch twill with hard-worn details, front and back pockets and narrow, raw-edge, frayed hems.
